Title: Scientific and research work of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Part of an 11-poster series, "Scientific and research work of New China" (新中国的科学研究工作), published in 1952.Titled "Scientific research serves industrial construction" (科学研究为工业建设服务), it shows experiments with ductile iron in Fushun and experiments in Nanjing.
